item.title: Project Epidemic Models: Basic Epidemic models done in Python
item.description: In this fun project we explore the most basic mathematical models for epidemiology: the SIR and the SEIR models Read the Wikipedia on these. The SIR model is implemented in OO style with options for integration with simple Euler scheme or with a second order Runge-Kutta scheme. Besides this straight integration, we implement a Gillespie algorithm to run stochastic experiments here. As this is a variant of a dynamic Monte Carlo method, we can run various experiments using multiprocessing (from the multiprocessing python library).
